Hi,

I'm trying to work through and understand the H3 codebase, but I'm hav=
ing problems with the Apache Commons HttpClient Overlay. I understand the c=
oncept - it's a patched version of the original - but I can't find the modi=
fications or any description of the actual issues that are being resolved.
=

If I just compile H3 against the vanilla Apache library, will H3 fail? Wha=
t will go wrong? Does anyone know anything about what this overlay does?

T=
hanks,
Andy Jackson
